channel.title: How to make a file open with no extension
channel.description:
K so I accidentally made a file on my computer open every time with WinRar, now some programs don't want to open it with it. How can I change it back to where it says, "Windows needs to know what program created it.",
Thanks.

item.title: How to make a file open with no extension
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

RIght-click -> Open with -> Check “Make this the default program”

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a file open with no extension
